text:
Hey <@U01G0T3RKQS>, I did!  Firstly, you would need access to the beta for CRM Powered email marketing. I believe your customer success manager can help with that. Then, user defined should have been HubSpot defined. Here's a code that HubSpot shared with me
Hey <@U01G0T3RKQS>, I did!  Firstly, you would need access to the beta for CRM Powered email marketing. I believe your customer success manager can help with that. Then, user defined should have been HubSpot defined. Here's a code that HubSpot shared with me
```{% set associated_objects = crm_associations(contact.hs_object_id, 'HubSpot_DEFINED', 1) %}
{{ associated_objects }}```
You want to make sure that the number (1) here is the correct association id
Thank you SO much.  I am going to be working on this project later this evening.   Really appreciate you taking the time and clarifying this!!!  Have an amazing week, <@U01KPG2N1UL>!
